description: ff. 29. 176 x 130; 100 x 80 mm. 13 lin. 14th/15th cen. According to Ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 1772 the author is Ibn Ṣaḥnūn al-Dimashqī (d. 694/1294), to whom also the ms. Teheran-Mark. v. 15, no. 5217/14 is attributed, but in both mss. listed in Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 901 (38a) and in ms. Fatih 5411 (Fihrist al-makhṭūṭāt al-muṣawwarah, ch. 6, no. 496) the authorship is ascribed to Sharaf al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar , with the variant Ibn al-Muzza [?] instead of Ibn al-Marʼah. Incomplete at end: the text breaks off in the 7th bāb. Incip.: ... قال ... شرف الدىن .. ال معروف بابن المرأة .... أما بعد حمد الله خالق الداء والدواء ... فانى لما طالعت اکثر الکتب الطبىة لم اجد فىها ما ىشفى القلب
author: Ibn al-Marʻah, Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar
title: Mufarriḥ al-nafs
creator: Ibn al-Marʻah, Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar
subject: Islam—Doctrines—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
